name: Cubie (Ace Productions)
description:
Created on Sunday, January 2022

 Welcome to my first ever game release, made for the Mini-Jam 97: Simulation.

 This game is about a block named Cubie who lost his heart and now you must help him get his heart back. Be careful though because without his heart, his body is very fragile, and with every step, he will crack until he eventually shatters. It is up to you to reunite him to his heart in as few moves as possible.

 I hope you all enjoy this game and please inform me of any glitches or bugs in this game and I will get on them asap. Thank you!
